content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, may I have your name please?
Thanks, Mike! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're able to service your location?
Thanks for that information, Mike. Let me check if we provide service in your area.
I’m sorry, Mike, but it looks like your address is outside our service area. We wouldn’t want to leave you stranded, unfortunately. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
Actually, I was thinking about getting some plumbing repairs, but I’m moving soon, so I don’t really want to invest in repairs right now.

I completely understand, Mike. Moving soon can definitely make it tricky to prioritize repairs. If plans change or you need assistance after moving, please don’t hesitate to reach out. Have a smooth move!
reason: Customer declined to schedule due to moving
